00033 {
00036   class tgba_reachable_iterator
00037   {
00038   public:
00039     tgba_reachable_iterator(const tgba* a);
00040     virtual ~tgba_reachable_iterator();
00041 
00047     void run();
00048 
00056     virtual void add_state(const state* s) = 0;
00058     virtual const state* next_state() = 0;
00060 
00063     virtual bool want_state(const state* s) const;
00064 
00066     virtual void start();
00068     virtual void end();
00069 
00075     virtual void process_state(const state* s, int n, tgba_succ_iterator* si);
00088     virtual void process_link(const state* in_s, int in,
00089                               const state* out_s, int out,
00090                               const tgba_succ_iterator* si);
00091 
00092   protected:
00093     const tgba* automata_;      
00094 
00095     typedef Sgi::hash_map<const state*, int,
00096                           state_ptr_hash, state_ptr_equal> seen_map;
00097     seen_map seen;              
00098   };
